name: Misc Items
description: Items that might prove to be useful

pages.title: Jar
pages.text: The **Jar** is a relatively simple block that can store up to a stack of items. It will not drop its contents when broken. It also support rotation in 16 directions similar to the skull and incense

pages.title: Runic Charge
pages.text: The **Runic Charge** provides an easy way to recharge your rune slabs after they are drained from a ritual
